languages.text: {n}Звонкий смех доносится из-под маски.{/n} "Твоя непочтительность так смешна, ведь ты даже не осознаешь, сколь велика пропасть между вами. Он — пророк, прозревший нашу скорую погибель и милостиво принесший нам право избрать иной путь. Он — осколок древней мудрости из времен, когда мы еще не были рабами предопределенной нам горестной судьбы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Звонкий смех доносится из-под маски.{/n} "Твоя непочтительность так смешна, ведь ты даже не осознаешь, сколь велика пропасть между вами. Он — пророк, прозревший нашу скорую погибель и милостиво принесший нам право избрать иной путь. Он — осколок древней мудрости из времен, когда мы еще не были рабами предопределенной нам горестной судьбы".

languages.text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."
languages.original_text: {n}Звонкий смех доносится из-под маски.{/n} "Твоя непочтительность так смешна, ведь ты даже не осознаешь, сколь велика пропасть между вами. Он — пророк, прозревший нашу скорую погибель и милостиво принесший нам право избрать иной путь. Он — осколок древней мудрости из времен, когда мы еще не были рабами предопределенной нам горестной судьбы".

He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

languages.text: {n}Schallendes Gelächter ertönt von hinter der Maske.{/n} "Eure Unbekümmertheit ist zutiefst amüsant. Ihr habt tatsächlich keinen Schimmer, welche Kluft zwischen uns klafft. Er ist ein Prophet, der unseren bevorstehenden Untergang vorhergesehen hat und uns gnädigerweise das Recht geschenkt hat, einen anderen Pfad zu wählen. Er ist ein Splitter alter Weisheit aus einer Zeit, bevor wir Sklaven unserer eigenen bitteren Vorbestimmung waren."
languages.original_text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schallendes Gelächter ertönt von hinter der Maske.{/n} "Eure Unbekümmertheit ist zutiefst amüsant. Ihr habt tatsächlich keinen Schimmer, welche Kluft zwischen uns klafft. Er ist ein Prophet, der unseren bevorstehenden Untergang vorhergesehen hat und uns gnädigerweise das Recht geschenkt hat, einen anderen Pfad zu wählen. Er ist ein Splitter alter Weisheit aus einer Zeit, bevor wir Sklaven unserer eigenen bitteren Vorbestimmung waren."

languages.text: {n}Un rire sonore retentit derrière le masque.{/n} « Votre désinvolture est décidément touchante... Vous n'avez vraiment aucune idée de la largeur du fossé qui nous sépare. Il est le prophète qui a prédit notre chute imminente et qui, dans sa bonté, nous a accordé le droit de choisir une autre voie. Il est un fragment de sagesse d'une époque où nous n'étions pas encore esclaves de notre triste prédestination. »
languages.original_text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire sonore retentit derrière le masque.{/n} « Votre désinvolture est décidément touchante... Vous n'avez vraiment aucune idée de la largeur du fossé qui nous sépare. Il est le prophète qui a prédit notre chute imminente et qui, dans sa bonté, nous a accordé le droit de choisir une autre voie. Il est un fragment de sagesse d'une époque où nous n'étions pas encore esclaves de notre triste prédestination. »

languages.text: {n}面具后传来一阵响亮的笑声。{/n}“你的无知真是令人发笑，你根本不知道我们之间存在着怎样的鸿沟。他是位先知，他预见到了我们将至的厄运，慷慨地赐予我们选择不同道路的权利。他是古老智慧的碎片，来自于我们还未被痛苦宿命所奴役的时代。”
languages.original_text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

traits.locale_text: {n}面具后传来一阵响亮的笑声。{/n}“你的无知真是令人发笑，你根本不知道我们之间的鸿沟有多大。他是位先知，他预见到了我们将至的厄运，慷慨地赐予我们选择不同道路的权利。他是古老智慧的碎片，来自于我们还未被痛苦宿命所奴役的时代。”

languages.text: {n}仮面の奥から笑い声が響く。{/n}「そのふざけた態度は実に面白い。どうやら、我々を隔てる溝の深さにまったく気づいていないようだな。あの方は目の前の破滅を予見して、畏れ多くも別の道を選ぶ権利を与えてくださった預言者だ。あの方は、我々が悲痛な運命の奴隷になる前の時代から来た古の知恵の欠片なのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

traits.locale_text: {n}仮面の奥から笑い声が響く。{/n}「そのふざけた態度は実に面白い。どうだ、我々を隔てる溝の深さにひとつもピンときていないようだな。あの方は目の前の破滅を予見して、畏れ多くも別の道を選ぶ権利を与えてくださった預言者。あの方は、我々が悲痛な運命の奴隷になる前の時代から来た古の知恵の欠片なのだ」

languages.text: {n}Una sonora carcajada sale de detrás de la máscara.{/n} «Tu arrogancia es muy divertida. No tienes ni idea del abismo que nos separa. Es un profeta que previó nuestra inminente perdición y que nos ha concedido generosamente el derecho a elegir un camino diferente. Es un resquicio de sabiduría ancestral de un tiempo anterior a que fuéramos esclavos de nuestra amarga predeterminación».
languages.original_text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonora carcajada sale de detrás de la máscara.{/n} «Tu arrogancia es muy divertida. No tienes ni idea del tamaño del abismo que nos separa. Es un profeta que previó nuestra inminente perdición y nos ha concedido generosamente el derecho a elegir un camino diferente. Es un resquicio de sabiduría ancestral de un tiempo anterior a que fuéramos esclavos de nuestra amarga predeterminación».

languages.text: {n}Maskenin ardından bir kahkaha yankılanıyor.{/n} "Küstahlığın insanı eğlendiriyor. Aramızdaki uçuruma dair en ufak bir fikrin dahi yok. O, yaklaşan kıyametimizi öngören bir peygamberdir. Bize, farklı bir yol seçme hakkını lütfetmiştir. O, kara yazgımızın kölesi olmadan önceki kadim bilgelikten günümüze kalan nadide bir parçadır."
languages.original_text: {n}Resounding laughter comes from behind the mask.{/n} "Your flippancy is so amusing. Why, you have no inkling of the chasm that separates us. He is a prophet who foresaw our impending doom and who graciously bestowed upon us the right to choose a different path. He is a shard of ancient wisdom from a time before we were slaves to our bitter predestination."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maskenin ardında bir kahkaha yankılanıyor.{/n} "Küstahlığın insanı eğlendiriyor. Aramızdaki uçuruma dair en ufak bir fikrin dahi yok. O, yaklaşan kıyametimizi öngören bir peygamberdir. Bize, farklı bir yol seçme hakkını bahşetmiştir. O, kara yazgımızın kölesi olmadan önceki kadim bilgelikten günümüze kalan, nadide bir parçadır."
